description: Example AI response format with scored suggestions

example.message: I've analyzed your site and have several improvement suggestions.

scored_suggestions.message: Add meta descriptions to all pages for better SEO
Create a contact form on the About page
Add social media links to the footer
Compress images for faster page load

notes: scored_suggestions is an array of objects with 'message' and 'score' fields
score is a float between 0 and 1 (0.95 = 95% confidence/priority)
Backend automatically sorts by score and limits to top 5
Frontend displays suggestions as clickable items with score percentages
